scripts.build:asw: rm -Rf distasw && mkdir distasw && touch distasw/index.html && mkdir distasw/genaiscript && cp -r dist/* distasw/genaiscript
scripts.genai:frontmatter:
for file in "src/**/*.md"; do
node ../packages/cli/built/genaiscript.cjs run frontmatter "$file" --apply-edits
done
scripts.genai:technical:
for file in "src/**/*.md"; do
node ../packages/cli/built/genaiscript.cjs run technical "$file" --apply-edits
done
